```{r}
library(fagin)
library(rmonad)
con <- config()
file.symlink("../inst/yeast", "INPUT")
```

```{r}
d <- run_fagin(con)
missues(d) %>% subset(type == "error")
e <- mtabulate(d, code=TRUE) %>% subset(error != 0)

ms <- as.list(d)
ierr <- sapply(d, function(x) x$has_error())
ms[ierr]
```
